description: Retro Studios is an American subsidiary of Nintendo. The developer is best known for creating and publishing games in the Metroid Prime and Donkey Kong Country series.

Many of Retro Studios' games use audio files saved in the CSMP format. However, different games use differently-formatted CSMP files. For example, the CSMP files included in Donkey Kong Country Tropical Freeze contain extra data that is not present in Metroid Prime 3 or Donkey Kong Country Returns's CSMP files.
